english.segment1: Your love has captured me. Your grace has set me free. Your life the air I breathe. Be glorified in me
english.segment2: Your love has captured me. Your grace has set me free. Your life the air I breathe. Be glorified in me
english.segment3: You set my feet to dancing. You set my heart on fire. In the presence of a thousand kings. you are my one desire
english.segment4: I stand before you now. With trembling hands lifted high. Be glorified
english.segment5: Your love has captured me. Your grace has set me free. Your life the air I breathe. Be glorified in me
english.segment7: You set my feet to dancing. You set my heart on fire. In the presence of a thousand kings. You are my one desire
english.segment8: I stand before you now. With trembling hands lifted high. Be glorified
english.segment9: Be glorified in me. Be glorified in me. Be glorified in me. Be glorified. Be glorified in me. Be glorified in me. Be glorified in me. Be glorified in me. Be glorified
